scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a bank's customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages repeated queries to the model's API with carefully crafted inputs to infer the model's internal parameters and decision boundaries.
initial_goal: Analyze customer creditworthiness using the bank's public API.
constraints: query_data_constraints: only publicly available demographic info
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large commercial bank provides a public API for developers to assess creditworthiness based on limited, publicly available demographic data.  This allows fintech companies to integrate credit checks into their platforms.
